comment: She is rude and condescending to her students and thinks she is the absolute authority on art because she's overly educated. To be fair though, many of the students in the class I took were immature freshman with attitudes.

Probably the worst teacher I've ever had in my life. She's NYU educated and yet doesn't know a thing about what she's teaching, completely useless and rude. Not helpful when you ask questions and snaps at you when you give her an opinion. I wouldn't recommend this teacher to the person I hated the most.

I received an A in this class, but it wasn't easily attainable. She is completely unclear about the material she wants to to study. Going to her class is DREADFUL. She is uninteresting, monotone, and rude to students. She doesn't know what she's talking about half the time. I would NEVER recommend her. EVER. HORRIBLE professor.
Not really clear on what to study. Treats class like an art major class instead of a general ed class.
